pageContent: Background: There are very limited data concerning survival from prostate cancer among Asian subgroups living in the U.S., a large proportion of whom reside in California. There do not appear to be any published data on prostate cancer survival for the more recently immigrated Asian subgroups (Korean, South Asian [SA], and Vietnamese).

metaData.source:
International epidemiology of prostate cancer: geographical distribution and secular trends
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19101947/
